item.item: STRING: The item id (can also be a list of strings, then any of the listed has to be in this slot)

layers.min: INTEGER: minimum count of layers this banner or shield has
layers.max: INTEGER: maximum count of layers this banner or shield has
layers.base: STRING: the base color this banner or shield (none for uncolored) has

conditions.treasure: BOOLEAN: if this has to be a treasure or normal map

zoom_level.min: INTEGER: minimum count of zoom this map has
zoom_level.max: INTEGER: maximum count of zoom this map has

generation.min: INTEGER: maximum generation this written book has
generation.max: INTEGER: maximum generation this written book has

conditions.potion: STRING: the potion id that this potion/splash potion/lingering potion/tipped arrow has

time: INTEGER: The count of ticks the fuel will last as an integer

functions.item: STRING: the item to replace the original item with, default = the player the item it had put in
functions.nbt: STRING: Optional, what tags it gets, default = empty
functions.keep_nbt: STRING: Optional, what tags to keep, empty means all tags, {} means none, default = {}
functions.durability: FLOAT: durability of the item, 1=full, 0=broken, default = 1
